abstract: Afghanistan's highest court issues ruling recommending 20 years in prison for police commander known as Naqibullah, who was convicted of murdering Associated Press photographer Anja Niedringhaus in 2014.
lead_paragraph: The court ruled that a police officer convicted of murdering an Associated Press photographer, Anja Niedringhaus, should serve 20 years in prison, according to documents sent to the country’s attorney general.

headline.main: Afghanistan’s Supreme Court Sentences Journalist’s Killer
headline.print_headline: Afghanistan’s Supreme Court Sentences Journalist’s Killer

snippet: The court ruled that a police officer convicted of murdering an Associated Press photographer, Anja Niedringhaus, should serve 20 years in prison, according to documents sent to the country’s attorney general.
